name: Hair removal cream
title: Veet Pure · Hair removal cream · Bikini & armpits
description: Veet Hair removal cream Bikini & armpits

usageInformation.usage: Spread Veet cream generously over unwanted hair using the curved applicator. Do not rub into the skin. 2. Leave the cream on the skin for at least 5 minutes, the effect starts after 5 minutes. Do not leave on for longer than 10 minutes. Remove the cream with the spatula. 3. Wash the skin thoroughly with water to remove all residual cream.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Discover Veet PURE depilatory cream for the bikini area and underarms. Its formula, refined with as few ingredients as possible, gives a silky-smooth sensation. With no ammonia odour**, its fragrance is surprisingly pleasant. The depilatory cream can be used on the underarms and bikini line, as well as on the legs and arms. Its curved applicator makes it easy to apply, especially to the underarms and bikini area. Application: 1. spread Veet cream generously over unwanted hair using the curved applicator. Do not rub into the skin. 2. leave the cream on the skin for at least 5 minutes, the effect will start to be felt after 5 minutes. Do not leave on for more than 10 minutes. Remove the cream with a spatula. 3. Rinse skin thoroughly with water to remove all traces of cream.
